scrame.manager

Class StudentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • scrame.manager.StudentManager

  • public final class StudentManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class that manages the student list and perform related actions.

      • addStudent

        public static void addStudent(java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String major,
                              java.lang.String enroll,
                              java.lang.String matric)
                       throws IllegalStudentArgumentException
        Adds student with the given information.
        Parameters:
        name - student's name
        major - student's major
        enroll - student's enrollment semester
        matric - student's matric number
        Throws:
        IllegalStudentArgumentException - if there is another student registered under the same matric number

        matric - matriculation number

        r - individual record of student and course

      • printIndividualAssessment

                                              java.lang.String check)
        Overloaded method to print weightage as pairs of component and mark.
        Parameters:
        r - individual record of student and course
        check - focus on the string check

      • isStudentInList

        public static boolean isStudentInList(java.lang.String matric)
        Checks if a student is registered.
        Parameters:
        matric - matric ID of the student
        Returns:
        true if student in the list, false otherwise

      • findStudent

        public static Student findStudent(java.lang.String matric)
                           throws StudentNotFoundException
        Returns student with a given matric number.
        Parameters:
        matric - matric number
        Returns:
        student object
        Throws:
        StudentNotFoundException - if there are no students found with the supplied matric number
